projects.title: Imran-Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: Boctat - Tour & Travel Website
projects.bodyText:
- A fully responsive travel website built using **HTML**, **CSS**, and **JavaScript**.
 - Includes visually appealing sections for destinations, booking, and packages.
 - Interactive UI to explore tours and make bookings easily.

projects.title: Snacks In Seconds - Restaurant Website
projects.bodyText:
- A modern restaurant website designed using **HTML**, **CSS**, **JavaScript**, and **jQuery**.
 - Features include dynamic menu display, user interaction, and responsive design.
 - Backend functionality powered by **Mongoose** and **Bootstrap** for styling.

projects.title: Secrets Web App
projects.bodyText:
- A secure web application to anonymously share secrets, made with **HTML**, **CSS**, **JavaScript**, and **EJS**.
 - Implements authentication and session handling with **Express**.
 - Secrets are stored and rendered securely using templating.

projects.title: Keeper App
projects.bodyText:
- A digital note-keeping application inspired by Google Keep.
 - Built using **React.js**, **Node.js**, and **MongoDB** for full-stack functionality.
 - Users can create, delete, and store notes dynamically.

projects.title: Weather App
projects.bodyText:
- A weather forecast web app using **Google Weather API**.
 - Provides real-time weather updates for searched locations.
 - Built with **HTML**, **CSS**, and **JavaScript** for dynamic user experience.
